title: Batman 80-Page Giant 2011 (2011) (Digital) (TheHand-Empire)
description:
This special 80-page Giant edition one-shot features several short stories about Batman by various up-and-coming and established writers and artists. 

The featured tales are:
Intervention by Eric Hobbs, art by Ted Naifeh
Short Straw by Troy Brownfield and Matt Brady, art by Thomas Nachlik
Unspoken by David and Jennifer Skelly, art by Cristina Coronas 
On The Waterfront,by Guy Major, art by Eric Nguyen
Danger Drive by Terrance Griep, art by Peter Pachoumis 
Fearless by Caleb Monroe art by Geoff Shaw
One Lock, Many Keys by Joe Caramagna, art by Joe Lalich

As indicated by the cover, many of Batman's friends and foes are utilized in these stores, including Catwoman, Victor Szasz, The Question, The Riddler, The Falcon, and Solomon Grundy. This digital copy is by TheHand-Empire, and it looks fantastic. As always, much credit and appreciation to the original scanners, please seed and enjoy! :-)
